Major_Arcs.title: Cover Introduction: The Human Meteor
Major_Arcs.description: Introduction to the comic book and the main character, The Human Meteor, setting the stage for an underwater adventure.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Page Setup
sub_scenes.description: The cover page introduces the comic title, main character, and setting before the story begins.

Major_Arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and the Waterfront Chase
Major_Arcs.description: Duke picks up playboys, becomes suspicious of being followed, and is chased by G-Men, leading to his transformation into the Human Meteor.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi and Waterfront Setup
sub_scenes.description: Duke picks up playboys and the initial setup of the taxi ride to the waterfront is established, including waterfront restrictions and Duke's special pass.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: The G-Men initiate a car chase, leading Duke to transform into the Human Meteor to confront them.

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Intervention and Yacht Plot Begins
Major_Arcs.description: Human Meteor confronts the G-Men, police praise his actions, and a cop shooter reveals suspicions about a yacht. Duke plans with Toby to stowaway on the yacht Marlin.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor vs. G-Men
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the G-Men and neutralizes one of them.

sub_scenes.title: Police and Cop Shooter's Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Police officers praise Human Meteor's work, while a cop shooter in the hospital reveals suspicions about a yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Stowaway Plan and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with Toby to stowaway on the yacht Marlin to investigate, but Toby is discovered.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Danger
Major_Arcs.description: Toby, disguised as Pete, investigates the yacht, discovers a depth chart, is pushed overboard, returns, and connects the chart to a submarine sighting, reporting to the captain.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Yacht Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Toby, as Pete, observes the yacht and starts investigating 'Pete's cabin', discovering a marked depth chart.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Marked Depth Chart

sub_scenes.title: Danger and Return
sub_scenes.description: Toby is pushed overboard but climbs back onto the yacht, planning revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Submarine Discovery and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Toby sees a submarine, connects it to the depth chart, and reports his findings to the captain.

narrative_arcs.title: Reporting to the Captain and Recognition

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Underwater Confrontation and Ship Attack
Major_Arcs.description: Namor, acting on Toby's information, dives, discovers a torpedo operation, confronts divers, attacks the ship, and returns to the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Namor dives from the yacht and discovers a sunken Japanese submarine being used to replenish torpedoes.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Submarine Discovery
Underwater Torpedo Operation and Namor's Realization

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation with Divers
sub_scenes.description: Namor confronts the divers, leading to a fight and their attempt to escape.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor attacks the ship, causing chaos and forcing the crew to react.

narrative_arcs.title: Targeting the Submarine with a Torpedo
Ship Crew Reacts to Peter's Fate and Geyser

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Confrontation and Map Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Namor reaches the yacht, confronts the crew, and searches for the depth map, finding it and exposing Peter's betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor Reaches the Yacht and Confronts the Crew
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Presenting the Depth Map to the Captain

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Recovery, and Home
sub_scenes.description: Namor, Toby, and Duke escape, Toby recovers in the hospital, and they return home, concluding the yacht mission.

Major_Arcs.title: The Wallet and Bus Company Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: Skip and Chuck get involved in a spy ring case after finding a wallet, leading to confrontation with spies and military intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads confront Nazi fiends in a war-like setting.

sub_scenes.title: Observing the Ambulance
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck observe an ambulance arriving at a neighbor's house, sparking their curiosity and concern.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: An intern drops a wallet, which Skip and Chuck find and attempt to return, discovering it's from a bus company.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Attempt to Return Dropped Wallet
Discovery of the Wallet and Bus Company Address

sub_scenes.title: Marine and Major Bronson Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Near the bus garage, Skip and Chuck witness a Marine saluting a civilian, Major Bronson, and learn about his identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Identity
Explanation of Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Returning the Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck return the wallet to the bus company and are taken to meet Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Returning the Wallet to the Bus Company

sub_scenes.title: Mr. Horst's Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst abruptly confronts Skip and Chuck, aggressively questioning them.

narrative_arcs.title: Mr. Horst's Abrupt Arrival and Confrontation
Close-up of Mr. Horst's Menacing Face

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, accusing them of lying and plotting to kill them with carbon monoxide.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Downfall
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, Bronson is attacked, and his own henchmen betray him.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Chuck seeks help, and they discover sabotage plans in a secret office at the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Military Intervention and Capture
sub_scenes.description: Military arrives at the barracks and engages in a fight, capturing the antagonists including Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Fight and Injury
sub_scenes.description: Marines fight 'Nazi rats' in the barracks, and Major Bronson is severely injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Major's Injury and Urgent Medical Aid

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Flashback shows threat to Major Bronson and boy, and resolution shows Major Bronson recovering, victory declared against Nazi spy ring.

Major_Arcs.title: Rescue of Rosita in South America
Major_Arcs.description: The Champ and Henry get involved in rescuing Rosita, the President's daughter, from El Tigre and Axis agents in South America.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Flashback
sub_scenes.description: A flashback to a desert setting introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in a fight.

sub_scenes.title: South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Establishment of a 'Sleepy South American Town' setting where 'The Americans' are staying.

narrative_arcs.title: Establishment of a South American Town Setting

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Room Invasion
sub_scenes.description: Army officers invade 'The Champ' and Henry's hotel room, questioning their presence.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Room Standoff
sub_scenes.description: Hotel room standoff with army officers, ending with their abrupt departure and warning.

narrative_arcs.title: Hotel Room Standoff and Abrupt Departure

sub_scenes.title: Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre, linked to Axis powers, explaining army's actions.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Consul Help
sub_scenes.description: 'The Champ' and Henry decide to seek assistance from the American Consul.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Motives
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's ransom demand is revealed to be politically motivated and Axis-linked.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Axis Connection

sub_scenes.title: Forced Abduction and Journey
sub_scenes.description: 'The Champ' and Henry are forced into a car and driven to a house under duress.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the House and Introduction to 'Mama'

sub_scenes.title: Plea for Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: 'Mama' reveals Rosita is her granddaughter and pleads for 'The Champ' and Henry's help to rescue her.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Planning to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout and using stage dollars as a distraction.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Dramatic self-revelation of El Tigre's identity.

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation inside the hideout and disposal of a man into a garbage can.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Rosita and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Search for Rosita and interrogation of 'El Tigre', revealing Axis agent involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Urgent News Delivery
sub_scenes.description: Urgent discussion among men in sombreros and arrival of a messenger with news for Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Location Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Messenger reveals Rosita is imprisoned by Axis agents and offers to lead Tigre to her.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mobilization
sub_scenes.description: Tigre orders immediate action to rescue Rosita, mobilizing his men.

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Forced Entry
sub_scenes.description: Horseback chase and forceful entry into a building.

sub_scenes.title: Citadel and Rear Entrance Plan
sub_scenes.description: Escape plan to citadel and strategic rear entrance plan for a hotel.

narrative_arcs.title: Execution of the Rear Entrance Plan

sub_scenes.title: Gymnastic Climb and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Gymnastic wall climb leading to Rosita's rescue and identification.

sub_scenes.title: Continued Resistance
sub_scenes.description: Continued resistance and combat even after Rosita's rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Continued Combat and Machine Gun Threat
sub_scenes.description: Brutal hand-to-hand combat continues, and a machine gun threat emerges, neutralized by Champ.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Champ's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Gratitude and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Gratitude expressed to Champ and reassurance given to Rosita after the intense combat.

sub_scenes.title: Government Troops Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Government troops arrive, indicating a broader operation and search for remaining enemies.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain Lawton's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: Devil Dog Dolan gets involved in Captain Lawton's personal crisis, leading to jungle combat, capture, and ultimately discipline for Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Devil Dog Dolan in intense hand-to-hand combat in a jungle setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Action: Jungle Combat

sub_scenes.title: Father's Bargain Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Captain Lawton reveals he disobeyed orders because his son was captured, and he made a bargain for sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Observation
sub_scenes.description: Dolan and companion infiltrate the jungle and are observed by hidden eyes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Unease and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Jungle unease leads to a native ambush on Dolan's companion.

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Dolan and others are captured and interrogated for sub detector plans, Dolan is tortured but complies.

sub_scenes.title: Justification and Arson
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions and sets fire to a wooden structure, defying pursuers.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Chief's Demise
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives in the jungle, leading to the chief's accidental death and native surrender.

sub_scenes.title: Post-Conflict Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Post-conflict dialogue with natives reveals chief's betrayal and tribe's desire for friendship with America.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Shipboard brawl initiated by Dolan, surprising the captain and officers.

sub_scenes.title: Consequences and Lesson
sub_scenes.description: Consequences of Dolan's actions, including punishment and learning a lesson about service.

Major_Arcs.title: The Case of the Murdered Banker
Major_Arcs.description: The Twinkle Twins investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading to community action and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the threat of 'ruthless killers' terrorizing ordinary people.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Threat

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Newspaper office assignment for Dan and Diane to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

sub_scenes.title: Police Information
sub_scenes.description: Information about suspect Tom Reilly and Dan and Diane gathering information from the police.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Sick Child
sub_scenes.description: Hospital visit to see Reilly's sick child, learning about her condition from a nurse.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Nurse and Revelation of Sick Girl

sub_scenes.title: Barnacci Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Diane and Dan suspect Barnacci of racketeering and decide to inform Elijah.

sub_scenes.title: Blood Need Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Revelation that Reilly's daughter needs Farnacci's blood for a transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Daughter and the Need for Farnacci's Blood

sub_scenes.title: Phoning Elijah
sub_scenes.description: Dan phones Elijah from a candy store to inform him about the blood type and request investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Clue
sub_scenes.description: Newspaper reveals connection between Farnacci, Haskel, Brown, and banker, leading to search for Reilly in Irish section.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Irish Section
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane arrive in the Irish section of town to search for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Irish Section and Reilly Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Unfruitful Search and New Lead
sub_scenes.description: Unfruitful search for Reilly in the Irish section, but encounter with Mrs. Murphy provides a new lead.

narrative_arcs.title: Unfruitful Search for Reilly in Irish Section
Encounter with Mrs. Murphy and Revelation of Reilly's Daughter's Plight

sub_scenes.title: Gunman Attack
sub_scenes.description: Gunman attack at Mrs. Murphy's house, mowing down Mrs. Murphy and a passenger, Dan starts pursuit.

sub_scenes.title: The Car Chase and Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Car chase ensues as Dan pursues gunman, and Diane follows in a taxi; Dan intervenes on the car roof.

narrative_arcs.title: Dan Intervenes and Confronts Gunman on Car Roof

sub_scenes.title: Community and Police Capture
sub_scenes.description: Community overpowers gunmen, and police arrive to apprehend the criminals.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Arrival and Apprehension of Criminals

sub_scenes.title: Post-Capture and Medical Emergency
sub_scenes.description: Police escort criminals, and emergency transport of shooting victims to hospital begins.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Waiting and Blood Incompatibility
sub_scenes.description: Anxious waiting at the hospital, doctor's diagnosis, and revelation of blood incompatibility for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Awaiting News and Doctor's Diagnosis at the Hospital
Blood Donation Offer and Compatibility Issue

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Drive Plan
sub_scenes.description: Community blood drive proposed to solve blood incompatibility issue.

sub_scenes.title: Community Blood Drive and Donor Found
sub_scenes.description: Urgent call for blood, community mobilization at hospital, blood type confirmation, and donor preparation.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent Call for Blood and Community Mobilization at Hospital
Blood Type Confirmation and Donor Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Successful Transfusion and Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Life-saving blood transfusion for Tom Reilly leads to immediate revival and anticipated recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: The Life-Saving Transfusion and Immediate Revival
Post-Transfusion Observation and Anticipation of Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Capture
sub_scenes.description: Planning Farnacci's capture and police pursuit leading to arrest at a poolroom.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Farnacci's Capture and Police Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Resolution with forced blood donation and birthday celebration for Reilly's daughter's recovery, Farnacci captured.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Blood Donation and Birthday Celebration for Recovery
